channel.title: Clipboard sharing doest not working from Host>VM
channel.description:
Problem with clipboard. Parrot OS, kernel 5.4, VirtualBox 6.1.0-dfsg-3, installed virtualbox virtualbox-ext-pack virtualbox-guest-x11
Host>VM Debian 10 copy-paste does not work VM Debian-Host copy-paste works
issue happened after update to new kernel and VB upgrade

item.title: Clipboard sharing doest not working from Host>VM
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Parrot OS

Not Whonix related. Has to be sorted out as per

Whonix – 7 Oct 19
